_header: In hell ne purgatory none other place
_description: John Audelay, A treatise on the Deadly Sins and their remedies — 263 lines in 13-line stanzas

BodDou302.First Lines:
In hel ne purgatore non oþer plaseþes synnes wold make
                    ȝou schamyd & schent…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…þai nold not on us haue no peteNy for þai
                    loue
BodDou302.Note: Begins imperfectly due to the loss of folios.

Halliwell-Phillipps,  James Orchard. 
             The Poems of John Audelay.
Percy Society
         14. London: Richards, 1844: 1-10.
